v: Oops, there's no briefing for this mission. Examine MISSION.INI and RA2.STR for examples of how to do this.

Yuri Side has escaped away through Chrono transmission ! When we had time to react, he had mobilized a large group of troops to destroy the area on a large scale, through which Yuri Side seemed to be challenging us. Commander, be alert to any possible attacks at any time. It is not a good idea to confront him directly. Instead, we’d better keep our power to avoid more damage. Objective 1：send Tanya to the base in North to contact with it again. Objective 2：destroy the Psychic Dominator. Objective 3：Tanya can’t die.

According to the analysis of our information organization, the Chronosphere used by Yuri Side when he escaped is in the Hope Cape. It seems that Yuri Side has already occupied our most important Chronosphere base, which was once our fort against the Soviet Union. Therefore, if Yuri Side keeps occupying the base, it will threaten us greatly. At the same time, we must prevent Yuri Side from having enough time to thoroughly get Chrono technology or it will lead to a new catastrophe!
Objective 1：destroy the Psychic Beacon and rescue our coastal base. Objective 2：occupy the war room so as to copy and destroy all our our files. Objective 3：destroy the Chronosphere before it is activated by Yuri Side again.

when we were busy destroying the Chronosphere in the Hope Cape, Yuri Side had already focused on emphatically attacking Washington. Therefore, we hopelessly got into Yuri Side’s trap and Washington was in his control. Meanwhile, he deployed a Psychic Dominator here to consolidate his mental control over Washington. However, we just received an emergency call, saying that the president seems to have failed to get away from Washington because of time limit and is still trapped in the White House, so Commander, do not act slowly or the president will become flesh.
Objective 1：destroy the Psychic Beacon before it is deployed again. Objective 2：destroy the Psychic Dominator and remove the threat of super weapons Objective 3：wipe out all of Yuri’s forces

In recent battles, we were always passively disadvantaged and now, we have been driven up to wall. There is no doubt that Yuri Side’s running away this time makes him wiser, but fortunately we still have Dr. Einstein’s trump card---Time Machine. Therefore, if we can go back to the past, we would still have the chance to kill Yuri before he implements all of his conspiracies. Commander, this is our last chance, so be sure that the time machine will not be destroyed by him by all means.
Objective 1：defend the time machine until it is activated.

e went back to the past by the time machine, but Yuri Side had asked his troops to head for the Hope Cape, so if we can prevent him from getting our Chrono technology, the war will probably change. Therefore, Commander! Take up your arms and fight for a new history.
Objective 1：contact with the base again. Objective 2：destroy Yuri Side’s communication base.

Perhaps we are still one step slower as Yuri Side has already got some research achievements on chrono technology. For lack of enough technical support, he focused his attention on Einstein Chrono Scientific Research Base in Black Forest, Germany in the hope of capturing our scientists through mental control. According to our latest military intelligence, the Soviet Union also plans to take the advantage to make a profit this time, so we will be faced with two powerful opponents. Therefore, Commander, whatever happens, you need to defend the lab well!
Objective 1：destroy Yuri Side’s Psychic Dominator at full speed to stop his deployment. Objective 2：destroy Soviet bases and troops. Objective 3：destroy Yuri Side’s front-line base. Note: be sure to keep either the Chronosphere or Einstein Laboratory

we finally traced to the place where Yuri Side’s Chrono device gives out energy. It is located on an uncharted island in the Pacific ocean. Some of our well-organized troops are going to be sent to help you through Chrono transmission. Commander, you must be extremely careful on the strange island!
Objective 1：land on the island and build a Chronosphere base. Objective 2：destroy or occupy Yuri Side’s Chrono experimental device. Objective 3：destroy Yuri Side’s rocket before it is launched !

In remains of the rocket, we found the black box recording Yuri Side’s fight plan--it aimed to fly to the moon, so we believe that Yuri Side is probably hiding in his base there. In order to clearly know Yuri Side’s real conspiracy, we sent a group of task force to investigate there, which, however, lost touch with the headquarters. Commander, conquer the moon and kill the devil Yuri Side!
Objective 1：defend the rocket landing platform to wait for the reinforcements. Objective 2：occupy Yuri Side’s command center to get his secret file. Objective 3：destroy all of Yuri Side’s forces

it is strange that Yuri Side is still alive! Although we don’t know how much military power Yuri Side possesses now, according to the description of the urgent telegram from the Kremlin, some of Yuri Side’s forces appeared in Moscow, having gained some ground at full speed and cutting off the communication between the headquarters and Moscow forces. General, I don’t care whether Yuri Side threatens us or not now, you must get rid of the rubbish in Moscow as soon as possible, be quick!
Objective 1：occupy the communication center and connect with the base again. Objective 2：destroy all of Yuri Side’s forces.

It was really terrible!---when we were busy dealing with Yuri Side’s surprise attack, the rest of some well-organized Allied forces had begun to fight against our regime, whose troops had already arrived in the sea area of Vladivostok. General, smash their foolish and babyish plan!
Objective 1：build a base. Objective 2：destroy all Allied forces.

General, because of our carelessness, Allied forces have taken some land back. According to the latest information analysis, American president has already returned the White House. General, you don’t wish to see another Capitalist regime that is against our Soviet in the world, do you? The position of the Communist Party is unshakable, so you need to capture American president and make Allied Nations surrender to us again!
Objective 1：build a military reserve base. Objective 2：destroy guard troops around the White House and capture American president. Clue：you can get rewards after destroying landmark buildings.

When we fought against Allied Nations, Yuri Side took the advantage to build a test base for Psychic Dominator. What does this mean if he is successful? I believe everyone knows the answer. General, you must destroy the Psychic Dominator as soon as possible so as to stifle his conspiracies in the cradle!
Objective 1：remove the threat from the Psychic Beacon and wait for the reinforcements. Objective 2：occupy the airport and get support from Allied forces. Objective 3：destroy the Psychic Dominator at all costs

Yuri Side’s forces are developing at a surprising speed. Therefore, after the prime minister and American president consulted with each other, they decided to smash his central area and capture him. The movement this time is adventurous, so General, you must be alert to emergencies at any time!
Objective 1：destroy Yuri Side’s Psychic Amplifier before he controls our forces. Objective 2：destroy Yuri Side’s fort and capture him.

Emergency! When we were about to announce the official signature of world peace agreement, our satellites, workers of space stations found a large number of unknown objects were approaching the earth rapidly and some of them were near the moon. As is reported, they are troops from Antare---a T80 star cloud. It seems that we are going to occupy the moon at first and then command and control the earth to make it their colony! Ok, General, we have to fight again!
Objective 1：defend the experiment center until the new weapons are worked out. Objective 2：lock and destroy extra-terrestrial communication base on the moon. Objective 3：go back to the earth quickly

General, Antare attacked us with irresistible force and we tried our best to destroy their forward-deployed forces arriving at the moon, but gave them enough time to get to the earth. The frontline of Moscow has fallen, so if Moscow is occupied, it will be a great disaster although the existing Star Battleships have been sent to each strategic center on the earth! A good news is that Allied Nations and some of troops that have surrendered to Yuri Side decided to join us and you are allowed to apply their technology. We don’t know the result of the war, so we should gather our strength to drive the bugs from Antare out of Moscow!
Objective 1：provide assistance to the Kremlin and help the prime minister to evacuate. Objective 2：coordinate Psychic Beacon to withstand Antare’s attacks. Objective 3：destroy the rest of Antare’s forces

We detected that there was unknown action in Yuri Side’s nest in Romania. Then it was proved that the Allied forces and Soviet army defending there had lost contact with the headquarters and they were working on some regular scientific research activities. The premier worried it may be a conspiracy. The action this time is rather secret, so you must build the base at your fastest speed and bring the data away from the fort.
Objective 1：destroy the Psychic Beacon and emancipate local Allied and Soviet forces Objective 2：send spies to the fort secretly to bring the data away.

The premier Yuri Side is trapped in Pacific Prison now. General, although it is defended closely here, our arms are well prepared and we have discovered a landing place on the east coast so as to save the premier as soon as possible and we will rise again!
Objective 1：enter into the psychic chamber to rescue premier Yuri. Objective 2：look for and rescue the Mobile Construction Vehicle. Objective 3：restore and activate the Psychic Beacon to capture American forces. Objective 4：Bring the premier into a helicopter safely and then leave.

We have successfully rescued the Premier and recollected some troops. However, because of limited materials, we need to have a military base. We aim at Yuri Island and plan to send an elite force to act. However, attention please, being unsatisfied with dictatorship of Allied Nations at present, the Soviet Union has already led off an attack to the island. Therefore, we need to make good use of the contradiction between them and don’t make Premier Yuri disappointed!
Objective 1：occupy Allied Battle Lab and control the rocket socket. Objective 2：destroy the rest of American forces who are unwilling to surrender and occupy the island

We have already occupied Yuri Island, repaired lunar landing equipment and prepared for landing on the moon to implement the plan of controlling the air. General, it seems that there are many troops and important military secrets, so you must find out their weapon designs!
Objective 1：destroy Soviet control center to make it out of control Objective 2：occupy the control center to get the control over the Soviet base Objective 3：destroy the signal transmission tower before the arrival of American reinforcements

We have taken a place on the moon but Soviet Red Army still threatens us greatly, so Premier Yuri plans to deploy a Psychic Beacon in Moscow to control the heartland of the Soviet Union, which is equal to controlling the whole Soviet Red Army. Of course, Moscow is guarded closely and taking action hastily will only make us lose more troops. Therefore, we sent a task force to give the Soviet Union an unprepared attack. At this time, when they have time to react, they are already controlled by our Psychic Beacon.
Objective 1：occupy NATECH to build a Psychic Beacon. Objective 2：activate the Psychic Beacon and capture the surrounding Soviet forces. Objective 3：destroy all of Soviet defense forces in Moscow and capture Romanov.

Premier of the Soviet Union surrendered and the next goal is American president. According to the present situation, America possesses the most powerful military forces among Allied Nations and has prism technology that has great threat. General, we must control America at the fastest speed and only in this way, can we achieve our ultimate purpose.
Objective 1：send will trucks to Soviet base to get the control over it. Objective 2：occupy Allied Battle Lab and get prism technology. Objective 3：occupy the White House and capture American president.

Little time is left. Because of the excessive release of Soviet power, Premier Yuri is trapped in Jurassic Period. According to the latest information, after the Soviet Union won, American forces have built another time machine secretly, as if hoping to go back to the past to change the result. Therefore, we gathered some troops in the hope of occupying the time machine and rescuing premier Yuri.
Objective 1：destroy coastal defence installations and American fleets. Objective 2：occupy the time machine. Objective 3：kill the tyrannosaurus and make premier Yuri enter into our time machine. Note: it is impossible for the Soviet to sit watching, so we need to look out for their sudden attacks.

Our psychic technology team has improved some performance of the Psychic Dominator and is planning to test it in Antarctica, and by the way occupy a Chronosphere abandoned by Allied Nations so as to research technology on Chrono travels. General, be careful as Allied Nations may find us at any time, so you must act quickly!
Objective 1：occupy the Chronosphere and wait for reinforcements. Objective 2：destroy Weather Control Device and build a Psychic Dominator. Objective 3：destroy the rest of Soviet and Allied forces. Note：be sure that the Chronosphere is not destroyed

American troops are now at the dead end, so they take out their last trump card----time machine to bet. How can we give these Yankees a chance to be arrogant again? General, just give America a bitter attack and I believe this war will be the final for American troops, so please complete the great chapter.
Objective 1：send infantries to occupy the communication center. Objective 2：lock and destroy the time machine. Objective 3：look for and occupy the secret lab to get psychic technology. Objective 4：build a Psychic Beacon and wait for the deployment.

Allied Nations broke up！What an inspiring news it is! But wait a moment, the former general Carville of Allied Nations and General Vladimir of the Soviet Union gathered the rest of their troops and built a naval base in Pearl Harbor. To some extent, they are the last leaders, so General, capture them and give them a summary execution!
Objective 1：clean up the troops stationing on the island, land on it and build a base there. Objective 2：land on Pearl Harbor to find out General Carville and General Vladimir Objective 3：take the generals of Allied Nations and the Soviet Union to the Soviet base to wait for their same ending as the Soviet base.
Purple Light - location：Pacific Military Prison
Space Crisis - location：Hope Cape in Alaska
Freedom and Compliance - location：Washington
Gamble - location：the Sahara Desert（top secret location）
military action：Disordered Spacetime - location：Hope Cape in Alaska
military action：Dark twilight - location: Black Forest in Germany
military action：Dimensional Rift - location：an uncharted island on the Pacific ocean
military action：Project Blue Book - location：Moon
military action：__ - location：__

military action：Agitation - location：Vladivostok
military action：Rulers’ Action - location：Washington DC, America
military action：Raids in North Africa - location：Morocco
military action：The Last Game - location：Romania
military action：Beleaguered - location：Moscow
military action：In-depth Intercept - location：Moon
military action：Hidden Stroke - location: Romania
military action：__ - location：__
military action：Comeback- location: Pacific Military Prison
military action：Abyssal Raids - location：Easter Island, the Pacific Ocean
military action：Lunar Prospector - location：Moon
military action: Twilight in Moscow - location：Moscow
military action: Washington Riot location：Washington
military action：Polar Demon location：Antarctic Peak
military action：Escaping or Obeying location：San Francisco, California
military action：Execution on the Spot - location：Pearl Harbor, Pacific Ocean
secret military action：Spacetime Disorder location：San Francisco, California
Biohazard: Dawn
task debugging：Allied Nations
task debugging：the Soviet Union
task debugging：Yuri Side
Objective 1：send Tanya to the base in North to contact with it again. Objective 2：destroy the Psychic Dominator. Objective 3：Tanya can’t die

Objective 1：destroy the Psychic Beacon and rescue our coastal base. Objective 2：occupy the war room so as to copy and destroy all our our files. Objective 3：destroy the Chronosphere before it is activated by Yuri Side again.
Objective 1：destroy the Psychic Beacon before it is deployed again. Objective 2：destroy the Psychic Dominator and remove the threat of super weapons Objective 3：wipe out all of Yuri’s forces
Objective 1：defend the time machine until it is activated
Objective 1：contact with the base again. Objective 2：destroy Yuri Side’s communication base.

Objective 1：destroy Yuri Side’s Psychic Dominator at full speed to stop his deployment. Objective 2：destroy Soviet bases and troops. Objective 3：destroy Yuri Side’s front-line base. Note: be sure to keep either the Chronosphere or Einstein Laboratory
Objective 1：land on the island and build a Chronosphere base. Objective 2：destroy or occupy Yuri Side’s Chrono experimental device. Objective 3：destroy Yuri Side’s rocket before it is launched !
Objective 1：defend the rocket landing platform to wait for the reinforcements. Objective 2：occupy Yuri Side’s command center to get his secret file. Objective 3：destroy all of Yuri Side’s forces
Objective 1：occupy the communication center and connect with the base again. Objective 2：destroy all of Yuri Side’s forces
Objective 1：build a base. Objective 2：destroy all Allied forces.
Objective 1：build a military reserve base. Objective 2：destroy guard troops around the White House and capture American president. Clue：you can get rewards after destroying landmark buildings.

Objective 1：remove the threat from the Psychic Beacon and wait for the reinforcements. Objective 2：occupy the airport and get support from Allied forces. Objective 3：destroy the Psychic Dominator at all costs
Objective 1：destroy Yuri Side’s Psychic Amplifier before he controls our forces. Objective 2：destroy Yuri Side’s fort and capture him.
Objective 1：defend the experiment center until the new weapons are worked out. Objective 2：lock and destroy extra-terrestrial communication base on the moon. Objective 3：go back to the earth quickly

Objective 1：provide assistance to the Kremlin and help the prime minister to evacuate. Objective 2：coordinate Psychic Beacon to withstand Antare’s attacks. Objective 3：destroy the rest of Antare’s forces
Objective 1：destroy the Psychic Beacon and emancipate local Allied and Soviet forces Objective 2：send spies to the fort secretly to bring the data away.

Objective 1：enter into the psychic chamber to rescue premier Yuri Objective 2：look for and rescue the Mobile Construction Vehicle. Objective 3：restore and activate the Psychic Beacon to capture American forces Objective 4：bring the premier into a helicopter safely and then leave.
Objective 1: occupy Allied Battle Lab and control the rocket socket. Objective 2：destroy the rest of American forces who are unwilling to surrender and occupy the island

Objective 1：occupy NATECH to build a Psychic Beacon. Objective 2：activate the Psychic Beacon and capture the surrounding Soviet forces. Objective 3：destroy all of Soviet defense forces in Moscow and capture Romanov.

Objective 2 Complete
Objective 3 Complete

ATTENTION: Premier Yuri came out, keep him safe.
MCV received, ready to build the base.
Reinforcements have arrived, waiting for your orders.
Objective 4: Send Premier Yuri to the helicopter and get out from here.
Satellite has reconnected.
HINT: Repair the bridge so that our forces can go and pass.

Objective 3: Capture and activate the Psychic Beacon.
MCV is sighted! Go for it right now!

Objective 1: Capture the Allied Battle Lab, and control the Rocket Launch Pad.
General, here's an open space, you can land here and build the base.
Elite naval forces have arrived, awaiting orders.
ALERT: Allied Battle Lab is destroyed, we lost control of the rocket.
ALERT: Launch Pad structure lost. Mission Failed.
Objective 2: Destroy all enemy Allied forces.
Objective 1 Completed.
WARNING: Soviet naval forces detected.
Deploy your GIs near the entrance to your base for a better defense
The Premier successfully retreated. Mission Accomplished.
Now is not the time for potty breaks, Commander
No time to sit, Commander
WARNING: The stench of Red Team is in the air
